segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it’s making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and it’s making me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, and it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be shocked when she sees the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside looks so calm compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of funny and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
